response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to extend to you an offer to purchase this item at a special price of $1,350,000. This amount reflects the significant worth of the product and aims to provide a fair transaction for both parties.

Given its importance to you, I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for you to secure this valuable asset without exceeding your expected budget too significantly. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you that the product will be delivered promptly and in perfect condition.

Please let me know if you require any additional information or if there's anything else I can assist you with. I look forward to hearing your response soon.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
